Summary: 2 glowing orange balls moving slowely across sky
divs: Sighting Detailswife and son had dogs outside for potty. wife called me outside to see strange light in sky. went outside and saw glowing orange ball coming across sky with what looked like fire coming from top pointing upward moving slowely.as i watched another one appeared behind first one.flashed light at it several times in sequence of 5 .second object responded with same amount of flashes.went across sky and disappeared over hill. no flashing lights like a plane would have ,no running lights also.really enjoyed seeing it.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Dillonvale
This sighting has never been favorited.
